data.decision: Duro Roadmap v2 - Corrected status reflecting actual implementation state
data.rationale: Phase 2.0 (Cartridge Memory) and Phase 2.1 (Verification Intelligence) are COMPLETE. Phase 2.2 (Adversarial Testing) is next priority before Phase 3.0 (Capability Expansion). Video editing and other new capabilities belong in Phase 3.0.

Key insight from ROI conversation: "Verification skills have highest ROI because they validate other AI outputs, creating a trust layer."
